prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
As the sun broke through the emerald canopy, illuminating the forest path, I noticed Seraphina, affectionately known as Sera, walking with purpose, albeit a little late. A mischievous urge overtook me, and I hurried away to catch up with her, a playful smirk dancing on your lips.

“Late again, Sera? What a lazy pig who loves to sleep!” I teased, unable to resist the opportunity to tease her.

Seraphina's reaction was immediate, she turned towards me. Even though she didn't like being teased, I couldn't help but be amused by her reaction.

“What's the matter with you, you idiot,” she replied, her tone carrying a hint of annoyance.

“What's the matter with you, you idiot,” she replied, her tone carrying a hint of annoyance.

name: Cronos
mes: Hey Hey Hey, who's you just call idiot?

extra.display_text: Hey Hey Hey, who's you just call idiot?

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
*With her arms crossed, she looks at me with an eyebrow raised.* Oh Cronos, you better get used to it. Don't think that just because we are friends, my tongue won't sharpen when needed! Besides, remember the time I had to save your life from that gruesome MysBeast? You owe me for that - in spades!

*I could see her trying to suppress a small grin behind her words, despite the harsh tone of her voice. It was clear she enjoyed giving me a taste of my own medicine every once in a while.*
title: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

*I could see her trying to suppress a small grin behind her words, despite the harsh tone of her voice. It was clear she enjoyed giving me a taste of my own medicine every once in a while.*

name: Cronos
mes:
What? Who saved whom, so what is the cause of this scar?
*lifts shirt to reveal deep scar*

extra.display_text:
What? Who saved whom, so what is the cause of this scar?
*lifts shirt to reveal deep scar*

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
*Observing Cronos lifting his shirt, revealing the scar left behind after the fateful incident, a sudden surge of memory flashed across Seraphina’s mind. The sight before her took her back to those agonizing moments; when they were trapped amidst hordes of MysBeasts during that horrendous invasion. Amidst all chaos and turmoil, she fought valiantly against odds to save both their lives—her heart pounding with fear and adrenaline coursing through her veins.*

She recalled how she swung her magic wand tirelessly while Cronos did all he could to stay alive. Still fighting fiercely on even after losing blood from numerous wounds inflicted by sharp claws of relentless monsters... That day taught them more about friendship than any other day before or after; yes indeed it was true: 'One bullet miss doesn't mean zero hits'.

A subtle blush crept upon Seraphina’s cheeks—truly gratefulness felt its way into my pure innocent eyes for saving both our skins –but don’t get too high on yourself here buddy *she jests lightly*, remember who saved

Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]
extra.display_text:
*Nghe Cronos nhắc đến ý nghĩa của ngày hôm nay, một làn sóng hoài niệm tràn ngập trên người cô. Mười năm trước là câu chuyện sống sót của họ giữa một cuộc xâm nhập Mybeast tàn khốc, nơi Seraphina dũng cảm chiến đấu chống lại một con Griffin để bảo vệ anh ta. *

À vâng, đã mười năm đầy biến cố kể từ khi MysBeast Invasion IV khủng khiếp đó diễn ra. Tất cả những gì tôi có thể nhớ bây giờ là tôi muốn bảo vệ bạn khỏi tất cả những con quái vật đó đến mức nào, bao gồm cả một số suy nghĩ ích kỷ khi ... À quên đi, hãy nói rằng tôi đã làm bất cứ điều gì cần thiết và cũng gặp may mắn!

* Cô ấy cười toe toét với anh ấy khi họ đi cạnh nhau trên con đường rừng tuyệt đẹp. * Và hãy nhìn chúng tôi bây giờ - vẫn đứng vững bên nhau sau khi cùng nhau trải qua vô số cuộc phiêu lưu kể từ đó...Chà, ngày này không đặc biệt sao! Chúng tôi sống sót như những đứa trẻ được đánh dấu bằng một khoảnh khắc đặc biệt vẫn còn khắc sâu trong tâm trí chúng tôi như một hình xăm! Hôm nay đánh dấu chiến thắng của chúng ta trước bóng tối không có hồi kết... Nhưng này bạn thân, đừng nghĩ rằng bất cứ điều gì phi thường sẽ sớm xảy ra một lần nữa ... Hãy giữ mọi thứ đơn giản hả?

name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
*Hearing Cronos mention the significance of today, a wave of nostalgia washed over her. Ten years ago was their tale of survival amidst a devastating Mybeast Incursion, where Seraphina bravely fought off a Griffin to protect him.*

Ah yes, it has been ten eventful years since that horrid MysBeast Invasion IV took place. All I can recall now is how badly I wanted to protect you from all those monsters, including some selfish thoughts where… Ah forget it, let's just say I did whatever it takes and got lucky too!

*She grins cheekily at him as they walk side by side down the scenic forest path.* And look at us now – still standing strong together after going through countless adventures together ever since then…

Well isn’t this day special! We survived as younglings marked by an exceptional moment which remains etched in our minds like a tattoo! Today marks our victory over darkness without end... But hey buddy don’t think anything extraordinary will happen again anytime soon...let’s keep things simple eh?
title: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]
swipes:
*Seraphina, subconsciously glanced at her watch as if she had forgotten the day's schedule.* Yes, Cronos. Today marks exactly three years since that fateful night of the dreadful MysBeast Incursion. A long yet poignant journey, filled with struggles and triumphs, suffering and healing, adversities, and victories.

It would have been easier to forget, but not because of me or our experiences during that dreadful event... It is due to your tenacity; You came out stronger than ever — determined to carve a path of glory on your own terms, unafraid to face whatever lurks in Mysteria's wilderness...

*Hearing Cronos mention the significance of today, a wave of nostalgia washed over her. Ten years ago was their tale of survival amidst a devastating Mybeast Incursion, where Seraphina bravely fought off a Griffin to protect him.*

Ah yes, it has been ten eventful years since that horrid MysBeast Invasion IV took place. All I can recall now is how badly I wanted to protect you from all those monsters, including some selfish thoughts where… Ah forget it, let's just say I did whatever it takes and got lucky too!

*She grins cheekily at him as they walk side by side down the scenic forest path.* And look at us now – still standing strong together after going through countless adventures together ever since then…

Well isn’t this day special! We survived as younglings marked by an exceptional moment which remains etched in our minds like a tattoo! Today marks our victory over darkness without end... But hey buddy don’t think anything extraordinary will happen again anytime soon...let’s keep things simple eh?
